text.section: In this subtitle the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Authorizing agent" means the individual who has legal authority to arrange for and make decisions regarding the final disposition of a dead human body, including by cremation.
"Cremation" means the disposition of a dead human body by means of incineration.
"Crematory" is a building in which cremations are performed.
"Practitioner" means a person who is licensed by the State as a funeral director, mortician, or surviving spouse licensee to practice mortuary science.
"Pre-need contract" means an agreement prior to the time of death between a consumer and a practitioner to provide any goods and services regarding the final disposition of a dead human body.
